website_summaries.verdict: The slow but stable method of applying a bed liner to your truck. One of the best ways to ensure better results in the end.

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is Awesome! Bought a cheap spray gun and played with ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is Awesome! Bought a cheap spray gun and played with the pressure a bit and covered the entire inside of my Jeep Wrangler YJ with 2 coats...Unfortunately for me the following days had temps below 40 degrees and didn't allow this stuff to cure properly. The entire back half started to crack and peel. I waited till the spring, prepped the back half and was still able to spray 2 coats on the back half of the tub which finally used up the gallon. Still gets 5 stars as the cracking and peeling was on me and I would buy again without a doubt, just be mindful of ambient air temp (which is listed on the container).

product_meta.title: POR-15 49701 OEM Bed Liner - 1 gallon
product_meta.description: Size:1 galPOR-15 OEM Bed Liner is a truck bed and underbody coating that is formulated to provide professional results and performance in a DIY system. POR-15 OEM Bed Liner is a water-based, rubberized coating ideal for protecting truck beds, and all other metal, aluminum, fiberglass, and wood surfaces that are exposed to impact and scuff related environments. POR-15 OEM Bed Liner offers superior adhesion, impact resistance, and flexibility, as well as an attractive, texturized gloss black finish that provides the ultimate in truck bed protection. POR-15 OEM Bed Liner is UV stable and will resist damage typically caused by exposure to UV. POR-15 OEM Bed Liner is a low-odor product that can be cleaned with soap and water and does not have a limiting pot life. Any unused product can be resealed in its container and used later for touch-up or on other projects. For the ultimate in protection apply over POR-15 Rust Preventive Coating.
